post.body: awesome present! All i want for xmas is my bf to not move away
im passing micosukee casino and just thought of u
Driving through cairo georgia, next town is called Climax. Lmao
Just passed georgia/florida state line
Day 2! Georgia here we come!
In for the night. In lake city
Gas stop in Gainesville.
Back on the road. Had a yummy lunch. Thanx mom for the sandwiches for the road.
1st stop- Ft.Myers to say bye to Carlos mom
Day 1 Officially have embarked on our roadtrip. Idaho or bust!
Kinda over this whole situation. Thanks for the memories!
Just had my thyroid sonogram, now i cross my fingers.
Im at a crossroads in life and i dont know what path to choose
At the dog park with carlos and sienna. http://snipurl.com/8unjh
At the dog park with sienna.
Packing your stuff into boxes. Every shirt i fold is another tear shed. Wish u didnt have to go :'(
New fall out boy is good but the backwards titles on cd case r hard to read.
At south miami senior high helping my mom with her french club xmas party. Go cobras!
Busy busy day
I wanna break every clock the hands of time can never move again. We can stay in this moment for the rest of our lives.
